net.smacke.jaydio

Class ByteAlignedChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.smacke.jaydio.ByteAlignedChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ByteChannel, Channel, ReadableByteChannel, SeekableByteChannel, WritableByteChannel

    public class ByteAlignedChannel
extends Object
implements SeekableByteChannel
    SeekableByteChannel implementation using DirectIoLib to bypass OS buffer cache.

    Author:
    smacke
